sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    

    <v-app-bar
      app
      color="white"
      flat
    >
      <v-avatar
        :color="$vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown ? 'grey darken-1' : 'transparent'"
        size="32"
        to="/profile"
      ></v-avatar>

      <v-tabs
        centered
        class="ml-n9"
        color="grey darken-1"
      >
        <v-tab
          v-for="(item, i) in items"
          :key="i"
          :to="item.link" link
        >
          
            <v-icon v-text="item.icon"></v-icon>
          
          
            {{item.title}}
         
        </v-tab>
      </v-tabs>

    <router-link :to="{name: 'post',params:{id:4}}">
      <v-avatar
        class="hidden-sm-and-down"
        color="grey darken-1 shrink"
        size="32"
       
      ></v-avatar>
    </router-link>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main>
      <router-view></router-view>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({ drawer: null,
     items: [
       { title: 'Home', icon: 'mdi-home',link:"/" },
        { title: 'Add Post', icon: 'mdi-note-plus',link:"/add-post" },
        { title: 'About', icon: 'mdi-help-box',link:"/about" },
        { title: 'Tech', icon: 'mdi-help-box',link:"/about" },
        { title: 'Cinema', icon: 'mdi-help-box',link:"/about" },
        { title: 'Motivational', icon: 'mdi-help-box',link:"/about" },
       
        
      ],
      login:false
    }),
    

  }
</script>
